list_definition.definition: (with in) to put (money) into (a firm or business) usually by buying shares in it, in order to make a profit

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He invested (20,000 dollars) in a building firm.

list_definition.definition: to establish (a person) officially in a position of authority etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The governor will be invested next week.
